data.title: Allen W. and Carol M. Schmidthorst College of Business
data.meta_description: The Schmidthorst College of Business is a top ranked college in the nation. Located in northern Ohio, the Schmidthorst College of Business' affordability, student involvement, career opportunities, and renowned faculty give students an exceptional college experience.
